Technique/Measure: Test Case Execution from Boundary Value Analysis
Comment:
GNATtest can \
generate and execute a testing framework for tests written by \
developers from requirements.

Technique/Measure: Test Case Execution from Error Guessing
Comment:
GNAT fuzz can automate \
the generation of large numbers of test cases at a high frequency.

Technique/Measure: Test Case Execution from Error Seeding
Equivalence Classes and Input Partition Testing
Comment:
Ada and SPARK \
provide specific features for partitioning function input and verifying that \
this partitioning is well formed (i.e., no overlap and no gaps).
